name: RUN COFFEE RUN
description:
RUN COFFEE RUN

Escape from the narcoleptic COFFEE island in this mini-fps-metroidvania

With limited time until you inevitably fall asleep (unless you grab some fresh COFFEE), find the way to open and escape trough the EMERGENCY EXIT

Don't worry, there are plenty of comfy beds around to aid in your journey.

Find all the upgrades and artifacts and dash to victory!

  • mini-metroidvania with short run times
  • drink coffee to stay awake - or wake up again in bed
  • discover various upgrades while exploring the compact island
  • corporate office tower full of dogs
  • Steve just renovated his home with fresh spikes
  • rumors of the ANCIENT PICKAXE OF DESTRUCTION
  • jump-jump-dash

Total playtime: around 5-10 minutes.

HTML5 for easy playing without hassle
DOWNLOAD WINDOWS version for optimal experience

Controls (shown in-game as well):

  • ESC or P for MENU
  • WSAD - MOVE
  • Mouse - LOOK
  • Left Mouse Button - Interact
  • SPACE - JUMP (2x for double jump)
  • Right Mouse Button - DASH (while in air)

Made with UE4 in 72h for Ludum Dare 50

Theme: "Delay The Inevitable"

by Mikołaj Bazaczek / @aerloth
